Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Bowl
Description: Crudely manufactured bowl with a rounded base, slightly flared mouth and simple lip. The surface bears no slip and is red-brown and black on the outside, while dark grey inside. The vessel has been polished, although more carefully inside than outside. The edge of the rim is uneven.
